businessProfile.name: Davidos Pizza & Wings
businessProfile.address: 2020 Eastside Dr SE #201, Conyers, GA 30013, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 2020 Eastside Dr SE #201, Conyers, GA 30013, USA

reviews.text: We chose this place for dinner because the pizza looked great. We came in at dinner time, it was pretty empty in there so I thought our orders would come out in a decent time frame. Everyone that worked there was nice, but they forgot about us. We each ordered a pizza and wings. My friend got her wings and ate half before I got mine. A girl had to come back & ask what my wings were because the guy put it in weird in the computer. We waited a long time before I got my pizza. We finished eating our wings, eventually my friend had say something because at least 30 minutes passed and she hadn't got her pizza. I took 2 bites of my pizza, on a scale of 1 to 10 it was a 3, the sauce is not good but the rest is. Our wings were the best we ever had, though.  Perfectly crispy and amazing seasoning. My friend finally gets her pizza. We got our pizzas boxed to go. The girl did give us some cheesecake for the wait. I don't mind the wait, I'm explaining our experience. I'll be back, but just for the wings.

Excellent experience! The pizza was very good, my wife crushed the wings, and the garlic knots were different from most garlic knots, but different-good. The person who handed us our order was very friendly and warm. We were about to walk out the door having forgotten our sodas, but she kindly reminded us! Great service!

This was our first visit and we were pleasantly surprised.  The service was excellent despite being extremely busy.  Having read other reviews about the lemon pepper wings that was a must try and they didn‚Äôt disappoint.  The cheesesteak was loaded and plentiful and my only comment was the roll was almost too soft.  The fries were plentiful and crispy, just as you want them.
Next visit we‚Äôll order a pizza and report on that.  Not sure if they plan to get a liquor license but a beer would have been a good addition.

I used to go to this place all the time and always recommend my friends and coworkers to come here for the wings since the day it opened. This restaurant used to be crowded. Despite working farther from Conyers, I was willing to drive all the way just for the wings. Recently the lemon pepper wings I usually order have ended up being way too salty. First time I let it go. This time when I ordered the wings, the same female cook working there made it salty again. I let her know this time and then she corrected me saying this is what lemon pepper wings are supposed to taste like. I am very disappointed. I loved going to this restaurant for years. She wasn‚Äôt even nice when I went to pick up my order.
Kai deserve a raise! She recommended me an awesome meal when I could not decide... not from Atlanta GA

editorial_summary.overview: Family-friendly joint serving traditional pies, chicken wings & Italian-style sandwiches.

recentReviews.text: We have been going here for many years and they never seem to disappoint. We always have a great time eating and joking and laughing and the customer service here is great. The person who took our order not too long ago, named CJ, was very nice. The food here is always great and We will be back soon. üòÉ
Someone told me real good piza here. I am not a fan,but ut at least the service was good. To each their own

I PLACED A 55$ order on door dash !!  For davidos Conyers and I DID NOT GET MY FOOD. THE DASHER EVEN CALLED ME AND SAID THEY WERE SAYING THEY DIDNT GET IT ALL but my card was charged !!! And I used to work at this P.O.S !! I have screenshots !! Of my order. August 27th 2025 ! And I called while my dasher was there and they acting like they didn‚Äôt get an order and I can‚Äôt cancel it DoorDash doesn‚Äôt give no refund !!!

We chose this place for dinner because the pizza looked great. We came in at dinner time, it was pretty empty in there so I thought our orders would come out in a decent time frame. Everyone that worked there was nice, but they forgot about us. We each ordered a pizza and wings. My friend got her wings and ate half before I got mine. A girl had to come back & ask what my wings were because the guy put it in weird in the computer. We waited a long time before I got my pizza. We finished eating our wings, eventually my friend had say something because at least 30 minutes passed and she hadn't got her pizza. I took 2 bites of my pizza, on a scale of 1 to 10 it was a 3, the sauce is not good but the rest is. Our wings were the best we ever had, though.  Perfectly crispy and amazing seasoning. My friend finally gets her pizza. We got our pizzas boxed to go. The girl did give us some cheesecake for the wait. I don't mind the wait, I'm explaining our experience. I'll be back, but just for the wings.

I used to go to this place all the time and always recommend my friends and coworkers to come here for the wings since the day it opened. This restaurant used to be crowded. Despite working farther from Conyers, I was willing to drive all the way just for the wings. Recently the lemon pepper wings I usually order have ended up being way too salty. First time I let it go. This time when I ordered the wings, the same female cook working there made it salty again. I let her know this time and then she corrected me saying this is what lemon pepper wings are supposed to taste like. I am very disappointed. I loved going to this restaurant for years. She wasn‚Äôt even nice when I went to pick up my order.
Food always good! Customers service always on point!!

detailedReviews.author: Joi Albright
detailedReviews.text: We have been going here for many years and they never seem to disappoint. We always have a great time eating and joking and laughing and the customer service here is great. The person who took our order not too long ago, named CJ, was very nice. The food here is always great and We will be back soon. üòÉ

detailedReviews.text: Someone told me real good piza here. I am not a fan,but ut at least the service was good. To each their own

THE DASHER EVEN CALLED ME AND SAID THEY WERE SAYING THEY DIDNT GET IT ALL but my card was charged !!! And I used to work at this P.O.S !! I have screenshots !! Of my order. August 27th 2025 ! And I called while my dasher was there and they acting like they didn‚Äôt get an order and I can‚Äôt cancel it DoorDash doesn‚Äôt give no refund !!!

detailedReviews.author: J Bubbles
detailedReviews.text: We chose this place for dinner because the pizza looked great. We came in at dinner time, it was pretty empty in there so I thought our orders would come out in a decent time frame. Everyone that worked there was nice, but they forgot about us. We each ordered a pizza and wings. My friend got her wings and ate half before I got mine. A girl had to come back & ask what my wings were because the guy put it in weird in the computer. We waited a long time before I got my pizza. We finished eating our wings, eventually my friend had say something because at least 30 minutes passed and she hadn't got her pizza. I took 2 bites of my pizza, on a scale of 1 to 10 it was a 3, the sauce is not good but the rest is. Our wings were the best we ever had, though.  Perfectly crispy and amazing seasoning. My friend finally gets her pizza. We got our pizzas boxed to go. The girl did give us some cheesecake for the wait. I don't mind the wait, I'm explaining our experience. I'll be back, but just for the wings.

detailedReviews.author: Mary Beth Winstead
detailedReviews.text: I used to go to this place all the time and always recommend my friends and coworkers to come here for the wings since the day it opened. This restaurant used to be crowded. Despite working farther from Conyers, I was willing to drive all the way just for the wings. Recently the lemon pepper wings I usually order have ended up being way too salty. First time I let it go. This time when I ordered the wings, the same female cook working there made it salty again. I let her know this time and then she corrected me saying this is what lemon pepper wings are supposed to taste like. I am very disappointed. I loved going to this restaurant for years. She wasn‚Äôt even nice when I went to pick up my order.

detailedReviews.author: Carla Mapp
detailedReviews.text: Food always good! Customers service always on point!!

detailedReviews.author: Austin I.
detailedReviews.text: Excellent experience! The pizza was very good, my wife crushed the wings, and the garlic knots were different from most garlic knots, but different-good. The person who handed us our order was very friendly and warm. We were about to walk out the door having forgotten our sodas, but she kindly reminded us! Great service!

detailedReviews.author: amelia h
detailedReviews.text: Really good food.

detailedReviews.author: Sharesiya Rush
detailedReviews.text: Everything. I have patronized this business  for years with my son. It was one of his most fav. Places. But now it will be. A memory. I ordered my food around 817p. First i was overcharged until i asked for total again. Ordered two combos. Small pep w. Green peppers, 6pc wing  lem pepper and large drink. 2nd combo small pepp w. Grn peppers and large drink family fry. Got there one pizzas were wrong no bell peppers.  They gave me burned fries on top and bottom and I know they knew it b.c I saw it as soon as box opened. So i  said ill be nice. I asked the girl at window to take them out and dont throw fries away ill still eat them..there was no seasoning like they normally do but I said. I got some lawrys at home. No problem.  Sent them.both bk. Got another pizza that looked like someone rushed. Threw it in the oven . So I asked for my receipt. I was told it's emailed. I told the girl I would call the owner in the morning b.c I had NEVER experienced this type of service before. Younger man. That resembled older owners - son potentially asked what's wrong. He... Said he was the owner. I  explained the burned fries which he already knew about. Showed him pizza and he nonchalantly asked me what was wrong. I couldn't do anything but laugh. Pizza was not round as normal it was exceptionally thin. No apology for the quality.  Service or anything and looked at me like I was unreasonable and asked did I want a refund. Normally I do and give food back and drive away and provide my terrible experience via reviews, which I will still do. But my son asked me for this so this time I kept the terribly made food. But I won't be back. I AM REALLY SADDENED THAT GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE  and quality IS HARD TO FIND ANYMORE.

detailedReviews.author: jonathan occi
detailedReviews.text: Always on point

detailedReviews.author: Julia Hurst
detailedReviews.text: It was dirty and the pizza was not cooked all the way and my food took a hour in a half

detailedReviews.author: Crystal Johnson
detailedReviews.text: I stopped @ the restaurant to order pizza today and after I placed my order I was going to pay cash with a $100.00 bill and the cashier told me she didn't have change for that amount of money. This was 4 hrs after the business was opened for the day so this business rather lose money because the can't take a $100.00 bill This is the very reason I don't deal with many black owned business. If this would have been a white business they would have made all kinda accommodations to service me now I see why I have always passed this business and never stopped. The cashier wasn't friendly or helpful @ all. So if you decide to pay with a $100.00 bill take your money somewhere else because they don't have any change.ü§î

detailedReviews.author: Rere Hunt
detailedReviews.text:
Gabby gave wonderful customer service. The food was hot, fresh, and amazing taste, so it was delicious ten stars out of five.
And then I have pictures this time I got off work make my husband up there and we took the food home I was eating on the way home

detailedReviews.author: Phillip Moss
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza find will certainly return

detailedReviews.author: Robert Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Good food and good timing.

detailedReviews.author: Nyna Perkins
detailedReviews.text: Their pizza and wings are awesome would definitely recommend trying it, you won't be disappointed üòã

detailedReviews.author: T Bradford
detailedReviews.text: EXCELLENT customer service! From the start, the order taker was polite and prompt. Nice atmosphere and the food is great! I ordered chicken Philly and ceased salad‚Ä¶.both great! Great Job, will return!!

detailedReviews.author: anisha robinson
detailedReviews.text: I ordered online. The food was prepared early and was ready when I arrived early.

detailedReviews.author: Tee Rouse
detailedReviews.text: The food is Awesome!! The best wings I've ever had in Ga!! Always clean and Great customer service. I highly recommend everyone to try them you will not be disappointed!! I've been coming to this restaurant for over 10yrs and I Love the food.

detailedReviews.author: Desiree Hunter
detailedReviews.text: Just go to pizza hut or papa johns. At least you won't get the cheap cheese and pizza sauce that you can pick up in Walmart. The cheese that isn't stringy when it's hot and the sauce that comes from a can. The ingredients are cheap. It tasted like the old pap johns but thankfully papa johns got the hint. Also the associates don't know their current promotions. At the time of this review you can indeed get 2 2 topping large pizzas for 23$. According to the associates that deal expired. This was supposed to be my cheat day. But I couldn't eat it. Ended up giving the crust to the dog and throwing it away.

detailedReviews.author: Marlon Griffith
detailedReviews.text: I am a frequent visitor of daVido‚Äôs pizza.  And I went through the drive-thru because I wasn‚Äôt able to come in. Needless to say I never had an issue with the service or food. But when I got home and looked at the ‚Äú2 LRG PIzzas that I ordered, I was disappointed at how the pizza looked. The last time I checked pizza is supposed to be round. And these 2 pizzas were anything other than round.

detailedReviews.author: Ronette Carter-Nesmith
detailedReviews.text: Everytime I go it's always clean, the staff is awesome and knowledgeable. They are always willing to help and accommodate if they can. Food is always on point.

detailedReviews.author: Kirk Hagan
detailedReviews.text: I typically get the wing combo, but it is always hot, fresh, and good food.  Hit there about once a week

detailedReviews.author: aric williams developer
detailedReviews.text: Kai deserve a raise! She recommended me an awesome meal when I could not decide... not from Atlanta GA

detailedReviews.author: Tonya Davis
detailedReviews.text: THEY DON‚ÄôT ANSWER THE PHONE!!!!!! I tried to call in my order but they wouldn‚Äôt answer the phone. So I went there. I walked in, there was no line so I called from my cell. The phone rang but the staff just ignored it. The food is good but if you want to call ahead FORGET IT!

detailedReviews.author: Brooke Isaacs
detailedReviews.text: Always good quality and great service!

detailedReviews.author: gone crazy
detailedReviews.text:
An amazing establishment!
Great food and Great service.
I'm currently going through tough times and an employee name GABBY helped me while I was in need. This restaurant is definitely a must try if you're in Conyers.

detailedReviews.author: christopher
detailedReviews.text: Idk how this place has 5 stars.. pizza is mediocre at best. Crust wasn't even crust. Pizza covered in flour. Little Cesars is wayyyy better also the garlic knots are literally just bread. No garlic no flavor. I feel bad for y'all who call this 5 star pizza

detailedReviews.author: Jerrica Conyers
detailedReviews.text: The food is delicious, friendly staff, tasty drinks.

detailedReviews.author: Latonya Lett
detailedReviews.text: I always experience great customer service and my pizza is always GREAT! Best pizza in the area hands down

detailedReviews.author: Natasha Smith
detailedReviews.text: Love this place

detailedReviews.author: Bernadette
detailedReviews.text: I remember this place, I was in a really bad spot in my life, and I went inside and spoke to the manager. He was very kind and offered a listening ear. I ordered my pizza and it was very good. I'll come back and I thank you Davido's pizza. B.

detailedReviews.author: Nia Malika Gossett
detailedReviews.text: Love the food, the staff, and the appreciation they show. Thank you, Davidos!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Ty‚ÄôRika Renee
detailedReviews.text: Food always good and fresh. I love this place and prices are reasonable.

detailedReviews.author: Stephens Development Group SDG
detailedReviews.text: Davidos's food and customer service are always excellent. I just picked up an order of wings for our Christmas movie night with my family. The food was hot and fresh, as always. This is hands-down the best wing spot in town.

detailedReviews.author: Eric Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Love the service here I love the staff everyone is respectful the place is very clean. A must good for great and affordable pizza and wings. Aria have great customer service.

detailedReviews.author: Shelsey R.
detailedReviews.text: Always good, fresh and ready in a timely manner.

detailedReviews.author: Erin Flanigan
detailedReviews.text: Great food , always fresh great customer service

detailedReviews.author: kaiulani garnerr
detailedReviews.text: Best Food!!

detailedReviews.author: Karen Tabb
detailedReviews.text: I ordered the daily special: small 1 topping + drink for $7.95. I asked for chicken, and added pineapple. This is what I got. It was my first time there. The manager asked me how was everything and I showed her the pizza presentation before I began eating, sure she asked because of the look on my face when I opened the box, and she defended the presentation saying, and I quote "It's because we make the dough here fresh." Ummm, I've had freshly made pizza that didn't come out looking like pizza night at home with the kids.  The toppings were unevenly distributed, and as a result so was the taste and flavors in every bite. It was good individually: good sauce, good dough, good chicken, canned pineapple to be expected. Just need to train the cook a little more with the execution. To the manager's credit, she offered to remake it but, I was hungry.

detailedReviews.author: TLEV
detailedReviews.text: The wings are the best. Always fresh and cooked to order. My family and i enjoy the wings and fries on game day. I definitely recommend this restaurant.

detailedReviews.author: Deborah Williams
detailedReviews.text: I come for the lunch special. Love the peach üçë punch.

detailedReviews.author: Scherie Jeffries
detailedReviews.text: We always receive good service at Davido's.  The menu provides good deals and pricing.  We have a good family fun dinner without breaking the bank.  They have lemon pepper wet and lemon pepper sprinkles! The Staff is always helpful and kind, and we appreciate it.

detailedReviews.author: Jorrye Nixon
detailedReviews.text: Great wings and pizza

detailedReviews.author: Natasha Jones
detailedReviews.text: I ‚ô•Ô∏è Davidos. Been patronizing them for years‚Ä¶the wings are consistently delicious. You‚Äôre always welcomed with a smile and professionalism.

detailedReviews.author: Ramisha Reid
detailedReviews.text: I have been a long time customer. I was around when there were 3.75 pizza so when insay I have no complaints! I enjoy them

detailedReviews.author: Latasha Jones
detailedReviews.text: I ordered a large pepperoni pizza and although it was cooked earlier than expected it was still hot when I arrived. The young lady at the counter was very polite and helpful with assisting me with my order. I would definitely recommend and eat here again.

detailedReviews.author: Jessie Mallard
detailedReviews.text: Great hot pizza every time!  The lemon pepper flats are good too.

detailedReviews.author: Gayla Smith
detailedReviews.text: Never disappointed! Food is always good and fresh!

detailedReviews.author: Grace Robinson
detailedReviews.text: Conyers location I praise you. This is the best wings and pizza over ever had in my entire life. The atmosphere the cleanliness the freshness of the food the customer service. Y‚Äôall deserve a 10/10

detailedReviews.author: Khara Ashburne
detailedReviews.text: Davidos is my personal favorite and go to. Hits every time. The pizza sauce is slightly sweet, which I like though others may not. I also lovvveee their lemon pepper wings. Best in the city for sure!

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Weaver
detailedReviews.text: Food is always hot and freshly made.

detailedReviews.author: M Marshall
detailedReviews.text: My favorite Pizza spot. Always satisfied! My grandbaby wants Davido‚Äôs at least over a week.

detailedReviews.author: Theodore Connor
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was ready exactly when they said it would be!!!! It was so good!!!! Definitely worth the cheat meal.

detailedReviews.author: Aneka Morton
detailedReviews.text: Fast service! Fresh ingredients & food is delicious

detailedReviews.author: Shaun Jones
detailedReviews.text: DaVidos was PERFECT for our very special Make-A-Wish Event!  The owners & staff were hands-on and heartfelt, assisting to make everyone feel special.  The food was delicious, with a wonderful dining room that was spacious for an expected # of 30 people. #GRATITUDE #MAKE-A-WISH #DAVIDOS #DISNEY

detailedReviews.author: Tracy Aaron
detailedReviews.text: We stumbled upon this hidden gem just out driving looking at homes. We kept meeting up here because the food is great and the staff is wonderful. We love it here. A few months later found a home in the Rockdale area and we unashamedly admit we frequent Davidos QUITE OFTEN!

detailedReviews.author: Kevin Singleton
detailedReviews.text: Service is A1 been going to this restaurant for over 10 years. Never been disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: Beauty queen101
detailedReviews.text: The pizza wasn‚Äôt that great but it was edible.

detailedReviews.author: Genisha Morton
detailedReviews.text: Amazing

detailedReviews.author: nicole champion
detailedReviews.text: They made my pizza wrong then tried to argue with me about it like I did not know what I ordered. I come here often and never had a bad experience the lady knows who she is. I tried to be polite and she tried to argue with me and cut me off during conversation. Samantha doesn‚Äôt need to be in the front handling customers - they also remade it THE EXACT SAME .

detailedReviews.author: Stacey (Mis'Chelle)
detailedReviews.text: I've been eating at Davido's for 15 years plus!! They have consistently had the best customer service, and food is always on point! I love them!!!

detailedReviews.author: Nikkiah Williams-Settles
detailedReviews.text: Always a pleasant atmosphere, good service and affordable!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: "The wings are perfectly crispy with amazing seasoning, making them the best wings ever had by customers." - social media marketing can showcase this strength
"Customer service is consistently excellent, with friendly and warm staff who ensure a positive dining experience." - review management can highlight this positive aspect
"Food is always hot, fresh, and delicious, with standout items like pizza and garlic knots that are different-good." - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and service inconsistencies - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Poor online visibility and competition with larger chains - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
